SELECT c.company_code ,c.company_name ,c.ceo_name ,t.start_date ,t.final_date ,t.users_cnt FROM company c JOIN contract t ON c.company_code = t.company_code
WHERE final_date < sysdate

SELECT t.contract_no ,t.start_date ,t.final_date ,t.users_cnt ,t.month_pay_price ,t.total_pay_price ,t.contract_state ,c.company_code ,c.company_name ,c.company_tel ,c.company_business_number ,c.company_type ,c.company_address ,c.company_post ,c.ceo_email FROM contract t JOIN company c ON t.company_code = c.company_code WHERE c.company_code = #{companyCode}

SELECT c.company_code ,c.company_name ,c.ceo_name ,t.start_date ,t.final_date ,t.users_cnt FROM company c JOIN contract t ON c.company_code = t.company_code
WHERE final_date > sysdate
SELECT qna_no ,qna_title ,qna_writer ,qna_date ,NVL(qna_company,'없음') as qna_company ,qna_state FROM qna
SELECT qna_no ,qna_title ,qna_content ,qna_writer ,qna_date ,NVL(qna_company,'없음') as qna_company ,qna_reply ,qna_state FROM qna WHERE qna_no = #{qnaNo}
